name: Paper Pond
description:
OH NO! It's raining! This is a 2-player game. You will be controlling either Frog or Turtle.

Keep your paper boat dry by throwing raindrops off the boat (on to your friend's boat ;D) before it sinks.

And keep an extra eye out for the mischievous paper plane that's out and about, looking for trouble!

Made in 48 hours during Chillennium 2017 Game Jam

By:  Ryan Sharpe, Shutong Liu, Anthony Eason
